Source.Name: libgig
Source.Summary: libgig is a library for dealing with Gigasampler, DLS, KORG, SoundFont and AKAI files.
Source.Description: libgig is a C++ library for loading, modifying existing and creating new Gigasampler (.gig) files and DLS (Downloadable Sounds) Level 1/2 files, KORG sample based instruments (.KSF and .KMP files), SoundFont v2 (.sf2) files and AKAI sampler data.

Package.Name: libgig
Package.Summary: libgig is a library for dealing with Gigasampler, DLS, KORG, SoundFont and AKAI files.
Package.Description: libgig is a C++ library for loading, modifying existing and creating new Gigasampler (.gig) files and DLS (Downloadable Sounds) Level 1/2 files, KORG sample based instruments (.KSF and .KMP files), SoundFont v2 (.sf2) files and AKAI sampler data.
